The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Jaraicejo, Caceres, Extremadura

Katherine Dau

Unverified

Jaraicejo lies on the pilgrimage route to Guadalupe. There is no information to confirm the patronage of Guadalupe here.

Works cited

  1. “Historia” Ayuntamiento de Jaricejo
